38 static cl_mem moclGetDummyImage2D (Mesh *mp) {
39  static int inited = 0;
40  static cl_mem image2d;
41  cl_int errcode;
42 
43  if (!inited) {
44  cl_image_format format = {CL_RGBA, CL_UNSIGNED_INT32};
45  image2d = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, 10, 10, 0, NULL, clck_(&errcode));
46  inited = 1;
47  } else {
48  clRetainMemObject (image2d);
49  }
50 
51  return image2d;
52 }
53 #endif

72 extern EXTERN_LANG
73 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_constants_device,
74  PREPARE_CONSTANTS_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer,
75  int *myrank_f,
76  int *h_NGLLX,
77  realw *h_hprime_xx, realw *h_hprimewgll_xx,
78  realw *h_wgllwgll_xy, realw *h_wgllwgll_xz, realw *h_wgllwgll_yz,
79  int *NSOURCES, int *nsources_local,
80  realw *h_sourcearrays,
81  int *h_islice_selected_source, int *h_ispec_selected_source,
82  int *nrec, int *nrec_local, int *nadj_rec_local,
83  int *h_number_receiver_global,
84  int *h_islice_selected_rec, int *h_ispec_selected_rec,
85  int *NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE, int *NGLOB_CRUST_MANTLE,
86  int *NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE_STRAIN_ONLY,
87  int *NSPECMAX_ISO_MANTLE, int *NSPECMAX_TISO_MANTLE,
88  int *NSPEC_OUTER_CORE, int *NGLOB_OUTER_CORE,
89  int *NSPEC_INNER_CORE, int *NGLOB_INNER_CORE,
90  int *NSPEC_INNER_CORE_STRAIN_ONLY,
91  int *SIMULATION_TYPE, int *NOISE_TOMOGRAPHY,
92  int *SAVE_FORWARD_f, int *ABSORBING_CONDITIONS_f,
93  int *OCEANS_f, int *GRAVITY_f,
94  int *ROTATION_f, int *EXACT_MASS_MATRIX_FOR_ROTATION_f,
95  int *ATTENUATION_f, int *UNDO_ATTENUATION_f,
96  int *PARTIAL_PHYS_DISPERSION_ONLY_f, int *USE_3D_ATTENUATION_ARRAYS_f,
97  int *COMPUTE_AND_STORE_STRAIN_f,
98  int *ANISOTROPIC_3D_MANTLE_f, int *ANISOTROPIC_INNER_CORE_f,
99  int *SAVE_BOUNDARY_MESH_f,
100  int *USE_MESH_COLORING_GPU_f,
101  int *ANISOTROPIC_KL_f, int *APPROXIMATE_HESS_KL_f,
102  realw *deltat_f, realw *b_deltat_f,
103  int *GPU_ASYNC_COPY_f) {
104 
105  TRACE ("prepare_constants_device");
106 
107  // allocates mesh parameter structure
108  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) malloc (sizeof (Mesh));
109 
110  // checks pointer
111  if (! mp) exit_on_error ("Error allocating mesh pointer");
112 
113  // sets fortran pointer
114  *Mesh_pointer = (long) mp;
115 
116  // safety checks
117  // constants defined in constants.h and mesh_constants_gpu.h have to match
118  if (*h_NGLLX != NGLLX) { exit_on_error ("NGLLX must be set to 5 for GPU devices in constants.h; please re-compile"); }
119  if (*GPU_ASYNC_COPY_f) {
120  if (! GPU_ASYNC_COPY) { exit_on_error ("GPU_ASYNC_COPY must be set to 1 for GPU devices in mesh_constants_gpu.h; please re-compile"); }
121  }else{
122  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) { exit_on_error ("GPU_ASYNC_COPY must be set to 0 for GPU devices in mesh_constants_gpu.h; please re-compile"); }
123  }
124 #ifdef USE_MESH_COLORING_GPU
125  if (! *USE_MESH_COLORING_GPU_f) { exit_on_error("Error with USE_MESH_COLORING_GPU constant; please re-compile\n"); }
126 #endif
127 
128  // initializes gpu array pointers
129  gpuInitialize_buffers(mp);
130 
131  // MPI process rank
132  mp->myrank = *myrank_f;
133 
134 #ifdef USE_CUDA
135  if (run_cuda) {
136  // setup two streams, one for compute and one for host<->device memory copies
137  // uses pinned memory for asynchronous data transfers
138  // note: creating streams may fail if multiple processes use a single GPU, and when CUDA devices are set
139  // for exclusive usage. in this case, you will have to setup a CUDA multiple process service (MPS), aka CUDA proxy.
140  // see: https://docs.nvidia.com/deploy/pdf/CUDA_Multi_Process_Service_Overview.pdf
141  // http://cudamusing.blogspot.ch/2013/07/enabling-cuda-multi-process-service-mps.html
142  //
143  // for some reason, calling cudaSetDevice() may return success even when devices are exclusive,
144  // and only when calling the cudaStreamCreate() below a cudaError occurs...
145  //
146  // compute stream
147  print_CUDA_error_if_any( cudaStreamCreate(&mp->compute_stream), 101);
148  // copy stream (needed to transfer MPI buffers)
149  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) print_CUDA_error_if_any( cudaStreamCreate(&mp->copy_stream), 102);
150  }
151 #endif
152 
153  // sets constant arrays
154  gpuSetConst (&mp->d_hprime_xx, NGLL2, h_hprime_xx);
155  gpuSetConst (&mp->d_hprimewgll_xx, NGLL2, h_hprimewgll_xx);
156 
157  gpuSetConst (&mp->d_wgllwgll_xy, NGLL2, h_wgllwgll_xy);
158  gpuSetConst (&mp->d_wgllwgll_xz, NGLL2, h_wgllwgll_xz);
159  gpuSetConst (&mp->d_wgllwgll_yz, NGLL2, h_wgllwgll_yz);
160 
161  // textures
162 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
163  if (run_opencl) {
164 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_CONSTANTS
165  cl_int errcode;
166  cl_image_format format = {CL_R, CL_UNSIGNED_INT32};
167 
168  mp->d_hprime_xx_cm_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, NGLL2, 1, 0, mp->d_hprime_xx.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
169  mp->d_hprimewgll_xx_cm_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, NGLL2, 1, 0, mp->d_hprimewgll_xx.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
170 #endif //USE_TEXTURES_CONSTANTS
171  }
172 #endif
173 #ifdef USE_CUDA
174  if (run_cuda) {
175  // Using texture memory for the hprime-style constants is slower on
176  // Fermi generation hardware, but *may* be faster on Kepler
177  // generation. We will reevaluate this again, so might as well leave
178  // in the code with #USE_TEXTURES_FIELDS not-defined.
179 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_CONSTANTS
180  // checks that realw is a float
181  if (sizeof(realw) != sizeof(float)) exit_on_error("TEXTURES only work with realw selected as float");
182 
183  // note: device memory returned by cudaMalloc guarantee that the offset is 0,
184  // however here we use the global memory array d_hprime_xx and need to provide an offset variable
185  size_t offset;
186 
187  // binds textures
188 #ifdef USE_OLDER_CUDA4_GPU
189  cudaChannelFormatDesc channelDesc = cudaCreateChannelDesc<realw>();
190  const textureReference* d_hprime_xx_tex_ptr;
191  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_hprime_xx_tex_ptr, "d_hprime_xx_tex"), 1101);
192  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(&offset, d_hprime_xx_tex_ptr, mp->d_hprime_xx,
193  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*(NGLL2)), 1102);
194  // d_hprime_xx was cudaMalloced, so offset is 0
195  //print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(d_hprime_xx_tex_offset,&offset,sizeof(offset)),11202);
196 
197  // weighted
198  const textureReference* d_hprimewgll_xx_tex_ptr;
199  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_hprimewgll_xx_tex_ptr, "d_hprimewgll_xx_tex"), 1107);
200  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(&offset, d_hprimewgll_xx_tex_ptr, mp->d_hprimewgll_xx,
201  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*(NGLL2)), 1108);
202  //print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(d_hprimewgll_xx_tex_offset,&offset,sizeof(offset)),11205);
203 #else
204  cudaChannelFormatDesc channelDesc = cudaCreateChannelDesc<realw>();
205  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(&offset, &d_hprime_xx_tex, mp->d_hprime_xx.cuda,
206  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*(NGLL2)), 11201);
207  // d_hprime_xx was cudaMalloced, so offset is 0
208  //print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(d_hprime_xx_tex_offset,&offset,sizeof(offset)),11202);
209  // debug
210  //if (mp->myrank == 0 ) printf("texture constants hprime_xx: offset = %lu \n",offset);
211 
212  // weighted
213  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(&offset, &d_hprimewgll_xx_tex, mp->d_hprimewgll_xx.cuda,
214  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*(NGLL2)), 11204);
215  //print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(d_hprimewgll_xx_tex_offset,&offset,sizeof(offset)),11205);
216  // debug
217  //if (mp->myrank == 0 ) printf("texture constants hprimewgll_xx: offset = %lu \n",offset);
218 #endif
219 #endif
220  }
221 #endif
222 
223  // sets global parameters
224  mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE = *NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
225  mp->NGLOB_CRUST_MANTLE = *NGLOB_CRUST_MANTLE;
226  mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE_STRAIN_ONLY = *NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE_STRAIN_ONLY;
227  mp->NSPECMAX_ISO_MANTLE = *NSPECMAX_ISO_MANTLE;
228  mp->NSPECMAX_TISO_MANTLE = *NSPECMAX_TISO_MANTLE;
229 
230  mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE = *NSPEC_OUTER_CORE;
231  mp->NGLOB_OUTER_CORE = *NGLOB_OUTER_CORE;
232 
233  mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE = *NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
234  mp->NGLOB_INNER_CORE = *NGLOB_INNER_CORE;
235  mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE_STRAIN_ONLY = *NSPEC_INNER_CORE_STRAIN_ONLY;
236 
237  // simulation type
238  mp->simulation_type = *SIMULATION_TYPE;
239  mp->noise_tomography = *NOISE_TOMOGRAPHY;
240 
241  // simulation flags initialization
242  mp->save_forward = *SAVE_FORWARD_f;
243  mp->absorbing_conditions = *ABSORBING_CONDITIONS_f;
244  mp->oceans = *OCEANS_f;
245  mp->gravity = *GRAVITY_f;
246  mp->rotation = *ROTATION_f;
247  mp->exact_mass_matrix_for_rotation = *EXACT_MASS_MATRIX_FOR_ROTATION_f;
248 
249  mp->attenuation = *ATTENUATION_f;
250  mp->undo_attenuation = *UNDO_ATTENUATION_f;
251  mp->partial_phys_dispersion_only = *PARTIAL_PHYS_DISPERSION_ONLY_f;
252  mp->use_3d_attenuation_arrays = *USE_3D_ATTENUATION_ARRAYS_f;
253 
254  mp->compute_and_store_strain = *COMPUTE_AND_STORE_STRAIN_f;
255  mp->anisotropic_3D_mantle = *ANISOTROPIC_3D_MANTLE_f;
256  mp->anisotropic_inner_core = *ANISOTROPIC_INNER_CORE_f;
257  mp->save_boundary_mesh = *SAVE_BOUNDARY_MESH_f;
258 
259  mp->anisotropic_kl = *ANISOTROPIC_KL_f;
260  mp->approximate_hess_kl = *APPROXIMATE_HESS_KL_f;
261 
262  // mesh coloring flag
263 #ifdef USE_MESH_COLORING_GPU
264  mp->use_mesh_coloring_gpu = 1;
265 #else
266  // mesh coloring
267  // note: this here passes the coloring as an option to the kernel routines
268  // the performance seems to be the same if one uses the pre-processing directives above or not
269  mp->use_mesh_coloring_gpu = *USE_MESH_COLORING_GPU_f;
270 #endif
271 
272  // sets flag to check if we need to save the stacey contributions to file
273  if (mp->undo_attenuation) {
274  // not needed for undo_attenuation scheme
275  mp->save_stacey = 0;
276  }else{
277  // used for simulation type 1 and 3
278  if ((mp->simulation_type == 1 && mp->save_forward) || (mp->simulation_type == 3)) {
279  mp->save_stacey = 1;
280  }else{
281  mp->save_stacey = 0;
282  }
283  }
284 
285  // sources
286  mp->nsources_local = *nsources_local;
287  if (mp->simulation_type == 1 || mp->simulation_type == 3) {
288  // not needed in case of pure adjoint simulations (SIMULATION_TYPE == 2)
289  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_sourcearrays, h_sourcearrays, (*NSOURCES) * NDIM * NGLL3);
290 
291  // allocates buffer on GPU for source time function values
292  gpuMalloc_double (&mp->d_stf_pre_compute, *NSOURCES);
293  }
294  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_islice_selected_source, h_islice_selected_source, *NSOURCES);
295  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ispec_selected_source, h_ispec_selected_source, *NSOURCES);
296 
297  // receiver stations
298  // note that: size (number_receiver_global) = nrec_local
299  // size (ispec_selected_rec) = nrec
300  // number of receiver located in this partition
301 
302  mp->nrec_local = *nrec_local;
303  if (mp->nrec_local > 0) {
304  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_number_receiver_global, h_number_receiver_global, mp->nrec_local);
305  // for seismograms
306  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_station_seismo_field, NDIM * NGLL3 * mp->nrec_local);
307 
308  // for transferring values from GPU to CPU
309  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) {
310 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
311  if (run_opencl) {
312  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL (station_seismo_field, NDIM * NGLL3 * mp->nrec_local * sizeof(realw));
313  }
314 #endif
315 #ifdef USE_CUDA
316  if (run_cuda) {
317  // TODO
318  // only pinned memory can handle memcpy calls asynchronously
319  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_station_seismo_field), NDIM*NGLL3*(mp->nrec_local)*sizeof(realw)),4015);
320  }
321 #endif
322  } else {
323  mp->h_station_seismo_field = (realw *) malloc (NDIM * NGLL3 * mp->nrec_local * sizeof(realw));
324  if (mp->h_station_seismo_field == NULL) { exit_on_error("h_station_seismo_field not allocated \n"); }
325  }
326 
327  // for adjoint strain
328  if (mp->simulation_type == 2) {
329  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_station_strain_field, NGLL3 * mp->nrec_local);
330 
331  mp->h_station_strain_field = (realw *) malloc (NGLL3 * mp->nrec_local * sizeof(realw));
332  if (mp->h_station_strain_field == NULL) { exit_on_error("h_station_strain_field not allocated \n"); }
333  }
334  }
335 
336  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ispec_selected_rec, h_ispec_selected_rec, *nrec);
337 
338  // receiver adjoint source arrays only used for noise and adjoint simulations
339  // adjoint source arrays
340 
341  mp->nadj_rec_local = *nadj_rec_local;
342  if (mp->nadj_rec_local > 0) {
343  // adjoint simulations
344  // checks simulation flag
345  if (mp->simulation_type != 2 && mp->simulation_type != 3 )
346  exit_on_error ("prepare_constants_device: nadj_rec_local invalid with simulation type\n");
347 
348  // prepares local irec array:
349  gpuMalloc_int (&mp->d_pre_computed_irec, mp->nadj_rec_local);
350 
351  // the irec_local variable needs to be precomputed (as
352  // h_pre_comp..), because normally it is in the loop updating accel,
353  // and due to how it's incremented, it cannot be parallelized
354  int *h_pre_computed_irec = (int *) malloc (mp->nadj_rec_local * sizeof (int));
355  if (h_pre_computed_irec == NULL) exit_on_error ("h_pre_computed_irec not allocated\n");
356 
357  // sets up local irec array
358  int irec_local = 0;
359  int irec;
360  for (irec = 0; irec < *nrec; irec++) {
361  if (mp->myrank == h_islice_selected_rec[irec]) {
362  irec_local++;
363  h_pre_computed_irec[irec_local-1] = irec;
364  }
365  }
366  if (irec_local != mp->nadj_rec_local) exit_on_error ("prepare_constants_device: irec_local not equal to nadj_rec_local\n");
367 
368  // copies values onto GPU
369  gpuCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_pre_computed_irec, h_pre_computed_irec, mp->nadj_rec_local);
370 
371  free (h_pre_computed_irec);
372 
373  // temporary array to prepare extracted source array values
374  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) {
375 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
376  if (run_opencl) {
377  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(adj_sourcearrays_slice, mp->nadj_rec_local * NDIM * NGLL3 * sizeof(realw));
378  }
379 #endif
380 #ifdef USE_CUDA
381  if (run_cuda) {
382  // note: Allocate pinned buffers otherwise cudaMemcpyAsync() will behave like cudaMemcpy(), i.e. synchronously.
383  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_adj_sourcearrays_slice),
384  (mp->nadj_rec_local)*NDIM*NGLL3*sizeof(realw)),6011);
385  }
386 #endif
387  } else {
388  mp->h_adj_sourcearrays_slice = (realw *) malloc (mp->nadj_rec_local * NDIM * NGLL3 * sizeof (realw));
389  if (mp->h_adj_sourcearrays_slice == NULL) exit_on_error ("h_adj_sourcearrays_slice not allocated\n");
390  }
391 
392  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_adj_sourcearrays, mp->nadj_rec_local * NDIM * NGLL3);
393  }
394 
395  // for rotation and new attenuation
396  mp->deltat = *deltat_f;
397  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
398  mp->b_deltat = *b_deltat_f;
399  }
400 
401  // initializes for rotational effects
402  mp->two_omega_earth = 0.f;
403  mp->b_two_omega_earth = 0.f;
404 
405 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
406  if (run_opencl) {
407  mp->has_last_copy_evt = 0;
408  }
409 #endif
410 
411  // buffer for norm checking at every timestamp
412  int blocksize = BLOCKSIZE_TRANSFER;
413 
414  int size,size_padded;
415  int num_blocks_x,num_blocks_y;
416 
417  // buffer for crust_mantle arrays has maximum size
418  if (mp->compute_and_store_strain){
419  size = MAX(mp->NGLOB_CRUST_MANTLE, NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE));
420  } else{
421  size = mp->NGLOB_CRUST_MANTLE;
422  }
423  size_padded = ((int) ceil (((double) size) / ((double) blocksize))) * blocksize;
424  get_blocks_xy (size_padded / blocksize, &num_blocks_x, &num_blocks_y);
425 
426  // creates buffer on GPU for maximum array values
427  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_norm_max, num_blocks_x * num_blocks_y);
428 
429  // synchronizes gpu calls
430  gpuSynchronize();
431 
432  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_constants_device");
433 }

435 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
436 // ROTATION simulations
437 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
438 
439 
440 extern EXTERN_LANG
441 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_fields_rotation_device,
442  PREPARE_FIELDS_ROTATION_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
443  realw *two_omega_earth_f,
444  realw *A_array_rotation,
445  realw *B_array_rotation,
446  realw *b_two_omega_earth_f,
447  realw *b_A_array_rotation,
448  realw *b_B_array_rotation,
449  int *NSPEC_OUTER_CORE_ROTATION) {
450 
451  TRACE ("prepare_fields_rotation_device");
452  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
453 
454  // arrays only needed when rotation is required
455 
456  if (! mp->rotation) {exit_on_error("prepare_fields_rotation_device: rotation flag not properly initialized");}
457 
458  // checks array size
459  if (*NSPEC_OUTER_CORE_ROTATION != mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE) {
460  printf ("Error prepare_fields_rotation_device: rotation array has wrong size: %d instead of %d\n",
461  *NSPEC_OUTER_CORE_ROTATION, mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
462  exit_on_error ("prepare_fields_rotation_device: rotation array has wrong size");
463  }
464 
465  // rotation arrays (needed only for outer core region)
466  mp->two_omega_earth = *two_omega_earth_f;
467  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_A_array_rotation, A_array_rotation, NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
468  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_B_array_rotation, B_array_rotation, NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
469 
470  // backward/reconstructed fields
471  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
472  mp->b_two_omega_earth = *b_two_omega_earth_f;
473  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_A_array_rotation, b_A_array_rotation, NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
474  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_B_array_rotation, b_B_array_rotation, NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
475  }
476 
477  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_fields_rotation_device");
478 }

484 extern EXTERN_LANG
485 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_fields_gravity_device,
486  PREPARE_FIELDS_gravity_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
487  realw *d_ln_density_dr_table,
488  realw *minus_rho_g_over_kappa_fluid,
489  realw *minus_gravity_table,
490  realw *minus_deriv_gravity_table,
491  realw *density_table,
492  realw *h_wgll_cube,
493  int *NRAD_GRAVITY,
494  realw *minus_g_icb,
495  realw *minus_g_cmb,
496  double *RHO_BOTTOM_OC,
497  double *RHO_TOP_OC) {
498 
499  TRACE ("prepare_fields_gravity_device");
500  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
501 
502  if (!mp->gravity) {
503  // no gravity case
504  // d ln (rho)/dr needed for the no gravity fluid potential
505  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_d_ln_density_dr_table, d_ln_density_dr_table, *NRAD_GRAVITY);
506 
507  } else {
508  // gravity case
509  mp->minus_g_icb = *minus_g_icb;
510  mp->minus_g_cmb = *minus_g_cmb;
511 
512  // sets up GLL weights cubed
513  gpuSetConst (&mp->d_wgll_cube, NGLL3, h_wgll_cube);
514 
515  // prepares gravity arrays
516  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_minus_rho_g_over_kappa_fluid, minus_rho_g_over_kappa_fluid, *NRAD_GRAVITY);
517  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_minus_gravity_table, minus_gravity_table, *NRAD_GRAVITY);
518  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_minus_deriv_gravity_table, minus_deriv_gravity_table, *NRAD_GRAVITY);
519  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_density_table, density_table, *NRAD_GRAVITY);
520  }
521 
522  // constants
523  mp->RHO_BOTTOM_OC = (realw) *RHO_BOTTOM_OC;
524  mp->RHO_TOP_OC = (realw) *RHO_TOP_OC;
525 
526  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_fields_gravity_device");
527 }

534 
535 extern EXTERN_LANG
536 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_fields_attenuat_device,
537  PREPARE_FIELDS_ATTENUAT_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
538  realw *R_xx_crust_mantle,
539  realw *R_yy_crust_mantle,
540  realw *R_xy_crust_mantle,
541  realw *R_xz_crust_mantle,
542  realw *R_yz_crust_mantle,
543  realw *b_R_xx_crust_mantle,
544  realw *b_R_yy_crust_mantle,
545  realw *b_R_xy_crust_mantle,
546  realw *b_R_xz_crust_mantle,
547  realw *b_R_yz_crust_mantle,
548  realw *factor_common_crust_mantle,
549  realw *one_minus_sum_beta_crust_mantle,
550  realw *R_xx_inner_core,
551  realw *R_yy_inner_core,
552  realw *R_xy_inner_core,
553  realw *R_xz_inner_core,
554  realw *R_yz_inner_core,
555  realw *b_R_xx_inner_core,
556  realw *b_R_yy_inner_core,
557  realw *b_R_xy_inner_core,
558  realw *b_R_xz_inner_core,
559  realw *b_R_yz_inner_core,
560  realw *factor_common_inner_core,
561  realw *one_minus_sum_beta_inner_core,
562  realw *alphaval, realw *betaval, realw *gammaval,
563  realw *b_alphaval, realw *b_betaval, realw *b_gammaval) {
564 
565  TRACE ("prepare_fields_attenuat_device");
566  int R_size1, R_size2, R_size3;
567  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
568 
569  // checks flag
570  if (! mp->attenuation) { exit_on_error("prepare_fields_attenuat_device attenuation not properly initialized"); }
571 
572  // crust_mantle
573  R_size1 = N_SLS*NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
574  if (mp->use_3d_attenuation_arrays) {
575  R_size2 = NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
576  R_size3 = N_SLS*NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
577  } else {
578  R_size2 = 1*mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
579  R_size3 = N_SLS*1*mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
580  }
581 
582  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_one_minus_sum_beta_crust_mantle, one_minus_sum_beta_crust_mantle, R_size2);
583 
584  if (! mp->partial_phys_dispersion_only) {
585  // common factor
586  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_factor_common_crust_mantle, factor_common_crust_mantle, R_size3);
587 
588  // memory variables
589  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_xx_crust_mantle, R_xx_crust_mantle, R_size1);
590  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_yy_crust_mantle, R_yy_crust_mantle, R_size1);
591  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_xy_crust_mantle, R_xy_crust_mantle, R_size1);
592  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_xz_crust_mantle, R_xz_crust_mantle, R_size1);
593  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_yz_crust_mantle, R_yz_crust_mantle, R_size1);
594  }
595 
596  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
597  if (! mp->partial_phys_dispersion_only) {
598  // memory variables
599  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_xx_crust_mantle, b_R_xx_crust_mantle, R_size1);
600  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_yy_crust_mantle, b_R_yy_crust_mantle, R_size1);
601  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_xy_crust_mantle, b_R_xy_crust_mantle, R_size1);
602  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_xz_crust_mantle, b_R_xz_crust_mantle, R_size1);
603  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_yz_crust_mantle, b_R_yz_crust_mantle, R_size1);
604  }
605  }
606 
607  // inner_core
608  R_size1 = N_SLS*NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
609  if (mp->use_3d_attenuation_arrays) {
610  R_size2 = NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
611  R_size3 = N_SLS*NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
612  } else {
613  R_size2 = 1*mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
614  R_size3 = N_SLS*1*mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
615  }
616 
617  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_one_minus_sum_beta_inner_core, one_minus_sum_beta_inner_core, R_size2);
618 
619  if (! mp->partial_phys_dispersion_only) {
620  // common factor
621  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_factor_common_inner_core, factor_common_inner_core, R_size3);
622 
623  // memory variables
624  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_xx_inner_core, R_xx_inner_core, R_size1);
625  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_yy_inner_core, R_yy_inner_core, R_size1);
626  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_xy_inner_core, R_xy_inner_core, R_size1);
627  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_xz_inner_core, R_xz_inner_core, R_size1);
628  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_R_yz_inner_core, R_yz_inner_core, R_size1);
629  }
630 
631  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
632  if (! mp->partial_phys_dispersion_only) {
633  // memory variables
634  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_xx_inner_core, b_R_xx_inner_core, R_size1);
635  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_yy_inner_core, b_R_yy_inner_core, R_size1);
636  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_xy_inner_core, b_R_xy_inner_core, R_size1);
637  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_xz_inner_core, b_R_xz_inner_core, R_size1);
638  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_R_yz_inner_core, b_R_yz_inner_core, R_size1);
639  }
640  }
641 
642  // alpha, beta, gamma factors
643  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_alphaval, alphaval, N_SLS);
644  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_betaval, betaval, N_SLS);
645  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_gammaval, gammaval, N_SLS);
646 
647  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
648  // alpha, beta, gamma factors for backward fields
649  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_alphaval, b_alphaval, N_SLS);
650  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_betaval, b_betaval, N_SLS);
651  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_gammaval, b_gammaval, N_SLS);
652  }
653 
654  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_fields_attenuat_device");
655 }

661 extern EXTERN_LANG
662 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_fields_strain_device,
663  PREPARE_FIELDS_STRAIN_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
664  realw *epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle,
665  realw *epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle,
666  realw *epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle,
667  realw *epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle,
668  realw *epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle,
669  realw *b_epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle,
670  realw *b_epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle,
671  realw *b_epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle,
672  realw *b_epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle,
673  realw *b_epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle,
674  realw *eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle,
675  realw *b_eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle,
676  realw *epsilondev_xx_inner_core,
677  realw *epsilondev_yy_inner_core,
678  realw *epsilondev_xy_inner_core,
679  realw *epsilondev_xz_inner_core,
680  realw *epsilondev_yz_inner_core,
681  realw *b_epsilondev_xx_inner_core,
682  realw *b_epsilondev_yy_inner_core,
683  realw *b_epsilondev_xy_inner_core,
684  realw *b_epsilondev_xz_inner_core,
685  realw *b_epsilondev_yz_inner_core,
686  realw *eps_trace_over_3_inner_core,
687  realw *b_eps_trace_over_3_inner_core) {
688 
689  TRACE ("prepare_fields_strain_device");
690  size_t R_size, size_strain_only;
691  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
692 
693  // checks flag
694  if (!mp->compute_and_store_strain) {
695  exit_on_error ("prepare_fields_strain_device strain not properly initialized");
696  }
697 
698  // crust_mantle
699  R_size = NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE;
700  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle, epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle, R_size);
701  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle, epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle, R_size);
702  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle, epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle, R_size);
703  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle, epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle, R_size);
704  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle, epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle, R_size);
705 
706  // strain
707  size_strain_only = NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE_STRAIN_ONLY;
708  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle, eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle, size_strain_only);
709 
710  // backward/reconstructed fields
711  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
712  if (mp->undo_attenuation) {
713  // strain will be computed locally based on displacement wavefield
714  // only uses pointers to already allocated arrays
715  mp->d_b_epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle);
716  mp->d_b_epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle);
717  mp->d_b_epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle);
718  mp->d_b_epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle);
719  mp->d_b_epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle);
720  mp->d_b_eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle);
721  } else {
722  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle, b_epsilondev_xx_crust_mantle, R_size);
723  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle, b_epsilondev_yy_crust_mantle, R_size);
724  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle, b_epsilondev_xy_crust_mantle, R_size);
725  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle, b_epsilondev_xz_crust_mantle, R_size);
726  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle, b_epsilondev_yz_crust_mantle, R_size);
727  //strain
728  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle, b_eps_trace_over_3_crust_mantle, R_size);
729  }
730  }
731 
732  // inner_core
733  R_size = NGLL3*mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE;
734  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_xx_inner_core, epsilondev_xx_inner_core, R_size);
735  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_yy_inner_core, epsilondev_yy_inner_core, R_size);
736  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_xy_inner_core, epsilondev_xy_inner_core, R_size);
737  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_xz_inner_core, epsilondev_xz_inner_core, R_size);
738  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_epsilondev_yz_inner_core, epsilondev_yz_inner_core, R_size);
739 
740  // strain
741  size_strain_only = NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE_STRAIN_ONLY);
742  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_eps_trace_over_3_inner_core, eps_trace_over_3_inner_core, size_strain_only);
743 
744  // backward/reconstructed fields
745  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
746  if (mp->undo_attenuation) {
747  // strain will be computed locally based on displacement wavefield
748  // only uses pointers to already allocated arrays
749  mp->d_b_epsilondev_xx_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_xx_inner_core);
750  mp->d_b_epsilondev_yy_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_yy_inner_core);
751  mp->d_b_epsilondev_xy_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_xy_inner_core);
752  mp->d_b_epsilondev_xz_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_xz_inner_core);
753  mp->d_b_epsilondev_yz_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_epsilondev_yz_inner_core);
754  mp->d_b_eps_trace_over_3_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_eps_trace_over_3_inner_core);
755  } else {
756  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_xx_inner_core, b_epsilondev_xx_inner_core, R_size);
757  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_yy_inner_core, b_epsilondev_yy_inner_core, R_size);
758  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_xy_inner_core, b_epsilondev_xy_inner_core, R_size);
759  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_xz_inner_core, b_epsilondev_xz_inner_core, R_size);
760  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_epsilondev_yz_inner_core, b_epsilondev_yz_inner_core, R_size);
761  // strain
762  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_eps_trace_over_3_inner_core, b_eps_trace_over_3_inner_core, R_size);
763  }
764  }
765 
766  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_fields_strain_device");
767 }

773 extern EXTERN_LANG
774 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_fields_absorb_device,
775  PREPARE_FIELDS_ABSORB_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
776  int *nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle, int *nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle,
777  int *nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle, int *nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle,
778  int *NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_CM, int *NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_CM,
779  int *nimin_crust_mantle, int *nimax_crust_mantle,
780  int *njmin_crust_mantle, int *njmax_crust_mantle,
781  int *nkmin_xi_crust_mantle, int *nkmin_eta_crust_mantle,
782  int *ibelm_xmin_crust_mantle, int *ibelm_xmax_crust_mantle,
783  int *ibelm_ymin_crust_mantle, int *ibelm_ymax_crust_mantle,
784  realw *normal_xmin_crust_mantle, realw *normal_xmax_crust_mantle,
785  realw *normal_ymin_crust_mantle, realw *normal_ymax_crust_mantle,
786  realw *jacobian2D_xmin_crust_mantle, realw *jacobian2D_xmax_crust_mantle,
787  realw *jacobian2D_ymin_crust_mantle, realw *jacobian2D_ymax_crust_mantle,
788  realw *rho_vp_crust_mantle,
789  realw *rho_vs_crust_mantle,
790  int *nspec2D_xmin_outer_core, int *nspec2D_xmax_outer_core,
791  int *nspec2D_ymin_outer_core, int *nspec2D_ymax_outer_core,
792  int *nspec2D_zmin_outer_core,
793  int *NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_OC, int *NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_OC,
794  int *nimin_outer_core, int *nimax_outer_core,
795  int *njmin_outer_core, int *njmax_outer_core,
796  int *nkmin_xi_outer_core, int *nkmin_eta_outer_core,
797  int *ibelm_xmin_outer_core, int *ibelm_xmax_outer_core,
798  int *ibelm_ymin_outer_core, int *ibelm_ymax_outer_core,
799  realw *jacobian2D_xmin_outer_core, realw *jacobian2D_xmax_outer_core,
800  realw *jacobian2D_ymin_outer_core, realw *jacobian2D_ymax_outer_core,
801  realw *vp_outer_core) {
802 
803  TRACE ("prepare_fields_absorb_device");
804  size_t size;
805  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
806 
807  // checks flag
808  if (! mp->absorbing_conditions) {
809  exit_on_error ("prepare_fields_absorb_device absorbing_conditions not properly initialized");
810  }
811 
812  // crust_mantle
813  mp->nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle = *nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle;
814  mp->nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle = *nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle;
815  mp->nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle = *nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle;
816  mp->nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle = *nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle;
817 
818  // vp & vs
819  size = NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE);
820  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rho_vp_crust_mantle, rho_vp_crust_mantle, size);
821  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rho_vs_crust_mantle, rho_vs_crust_mantle, size);
822 
823  // ijk index arrays
824  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nkmin_xi_crust_mantle, nkmin_xi_crust_mantle, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_CM));
825  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nkmin_eta_crust_mantle, nkmin_eta_crust_mantle, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_CM));
826  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_njmin_crust_mantle, njmin_crust_mantle, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_CM));
827  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_njmax_crust_mantle, njmax_crust_mantle, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_CM));
828  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nimin_crust_mantle, nimin_crust_mantle, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_CM));
829  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nimax_crust_mantle, nimax_crust_mantle, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_CM));
830 
831  // xmin
832  if (mp->nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle > 0) {
833  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_xmin_crust_mantle, ibelm_xmin_crust_mantle, mp->nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle);
834  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_xmin_crust_mantle, normal_xmin_crust_mantle, NDIM*NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle);
835  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_xmin_crust_mantle, jacobian2D_xmin_crust_mantle, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle);
836 
837  // boundary buffer
838  if (mp->save_stacey) {
839  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_xmin_crust_mantle, NDIM * NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmin_crust_mantle);
840  }
841  }
842 
843  // xmax
844  if (mp->nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle > 0) {
845  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_xmax_crust_mantle, ibelm_xmax_crust_mantle, mp->nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle);
846  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_xmax_crust_mantle, normal_xmax_crust_mantle, NDIM*NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle);
847  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_xmax_crust_mantle, jacobian2D_xmax_crust_mantle, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle);
848  // boundary buffer
849  if (mp->save_stacey) {
850  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_xmax_crust_mantle, NDIM * NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmax_crust_mantle);
851  }
852  }
853 
854  // ymin
855  if (mp->nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle > 0) {
856  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_ymin_crust_mantle, ibelm_ymin_crust_mantle, mp->nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle);
857  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_ymin_crust_mantle, normal_ymin_crust_mantle, NDIM*NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle);
858  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_ymin_crust_mantle, jacobian2D_ymin_crust_mantle, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle);
859  // boundary buffer
860  if (mp->save_stacey) {
861  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_ymin_crust_mantle, NDIM * NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymin_crust_mantle);
862  }
863  }
864 
865  // ymax
866  if (mp->nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle > 0) {
867  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_ymax_crust_mantle,
868  ibelm_ymax_crust_mantle, mp->nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle);
869  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_ymax_crust_mantle, normal_ymax_crust_mantle, NDIM * NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle);
870  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_ymax_crust_mantle, jacobian2D_ymax_crust_mantle, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle);
871 
872  // boundary buffer
873  if (mp->save_stacey) {
874  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_ymax_crust_mantle, NDIM * NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymax_crust_mantle);
875  }
876  }
877 
878  // outer_core
879  mp->nspec2D_xmin_outer_core = *nspec2D_xmin_outer_core;
880  mp->nspec2D_xmax_outer_core = *nspec2D_xmax_outer_core;
881  mp->nspec2D_ymin_outer_core = *nspec2D_ymin_outer_core;
882  mp->nspec2D_ymax_outer_core = *nspec2D_ymax_outer_core;
883  mp->nspec2D_zmin_outer_core = *nspec2D_zmin_outer_core;
884 
885  // vp
886  size = NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
887  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_vp_outer_core, vp_outer_core, size);
888 
889  // ijk index arrays
890  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nkmin_xi_outer_core, nkmin_xi_outer_core, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_OC));
891  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nkmin_eta_outer_core, nkmin_eta_outer_core, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_OC));
892  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_njmin_outer_core, njmin_outer_core, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_OC));
893  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_njmax_outer_core, njmax_outer_core, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_XMIN_XMAX_OC));
894  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nimin_outer_core, nimin_outer_core, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_OC));
895  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nimax_outer_core, nimax_outer_core, 2 * (*NSPEC2DMAX_YMIN_YMAX_OC));
896 
897  // xmin
898  if (mp->nspec2D_xmin_outer_core > 0) {
899  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_xmin_outer_core, ibelm_xmin_outer_core, mp->nspec2D_xmin_outer_core);
900  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_xmin_outer_core, jacobian2D_xmin_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmin_outer_core);
901  // boundary buffer
902  if (mp->save_stacey) {
903  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_xmin_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmin_outer_core);
904  }
905  }
906 
907  // xmax
908  if (mp->nspec2D_xmax_outer_core > 0) {
909  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_xmax_outer_core, ibelm_xmax_outer_core, mp->nspec2D_xmax_outer_core);
910  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_xmax_outer_core, jacobian2D_xmax_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmax_outer_core);
911 
912  // boundary buffer
913  if (mp->save_stacey) {
914  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_xmax_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_xmax_outer_core);
915  }
916  }
917 
918  // ymin
919  if (mp->nspec2D_ymin_outer_core > 0) {
920  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_ymin_outer_core, ibelm_ymin_outer_core, mp->nspec2D_ymin_outer_core);
921  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_ymin_outer_core, jacobian2D_ymin_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymin_outer_core);
922  // boundary buffer
923  if (mp->save_stacey) {
924  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_ymin_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymin_outer_core);
925  }
926  }
927 
928  // ymax
929  if (mp->nspec2D_ymax_outer_core > 0) {
930  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_ymax_outer_core, ibelm_ymax_outer_core, mp->nspec2D_ymax_outer_core);
931  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_ymax_outer_core, jacobian2D_ymax_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymax_outer_core);
932  // boundary buffer
933  if (mp->save_stacey) {
934  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_ymax_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_ymax_outer_core);
935  }
936  }
937 
938  // zmin
939  if (mp->nspec2D_zmin_outer_core > 0) {
940  // note: ibelm_bottom_outer_core and jacobian2D_bottom_outer_core will be allocated
941  // when preparing the outer core
942  // boundary buffer
943  if (mp->save_stacey) {
944  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_absorb_zmin_outer_core, NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_zmin_outer_core);
945  }
946  }
947 
948  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_fields_absorb_device");
949 }

951 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
952 // MPI interfaces
953 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
954 
955 extern EXTERN_LANG
956 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_mpi_buffers_device,
957  PREPARE_MPI_BUFFERS_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
958  int *num_interfaces_crust_mantle,
959  int *max_nibool_interfaces_cm,
960  int *nibool_interfaces_crust_mantle,
961  int *ibool_interfaces_crust_mantle,
962  int *num_interfaces_inner_core,
963  int *max_nibool_interfaces_ic,
964  int *nibool_interfaces_inner_core,
965  int *ibool_interfaces_inner_core,
966  int *num_interfaces_outer_core,
967  int *max_nibool_interfaces_oc,
968  int *nibool_interfaces_outer_core,
969  int *ibool_interfaces_outer_core) {
970 
971  TRACE ("prepare_mpi_buffers_device");
972 
973  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
974  size_t size_mpi_buffer;
975 
976  // prepares interprocess-edge exchange information
977 
978  // crust/mantle mesh
979  mp->num_interfaces_crust_mantle = *num_interfaces_crust_mantle;
980  mp->max_nibool_interfaces_cm = *max_nibool_interfaces_cm;
981 
982  if (mp->num_interfaces_crust_mantle > 0) {
983  // number of ibool entries array
984  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nibool_interfaces_crust_mantle, nibool_interfaces_crust_mantle,
985  mp->num_interfaces_crust_mantle);
986 
987  // ibool entries (iglob indices) values on interface
988  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibool_interfaces_crust_mantle, ibool_interfaces_crust_mantle,
989  mp->num_interfaces_crust_mantle * mp->max_nibool_interfaces_cm);
990 
991  size_mpi_buffer = NDIM*(mp->max_nibool_interfaces_cm)*(mp->num_interfaces_crust_mantle);
992 
993  // allocates MPI buffer for exchange with CPU
994  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_send_accel_buffer_crust_mantle, size_mpi_buffer);
995  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
996  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_send_accel_buffer_crust_mantle, size_mpi_buffer);
997  }
998 
999  // asynchronous MPI buffer
1000  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) {
1001 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1002  if (run_opencl) {
1003  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(send_accel_buffer_cm, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1004  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(recv_accel_buffer_cm, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1005 
1006  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1007  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(b_send_accel_buffer_cm, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1008  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(b_recv_accel_buffer_cm, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1009  }
1010  }
1011 #endif
1012 #ifdef USE_CUDA
1013  if (run_cuda) {
1014  // note: Allocate pinned MPI buffers.
1015  // MPI buffers use pinned memory allocated by cudaMallocHost, which
1016  // enables the use of asynchronous memory copies from host <-> device
1017  // send buffer
1018  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_send_accel_buffer_cm),sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1019  // receive buffer
1020  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_recv_accel_buffer_cm),sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1021  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1022  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_b_send_accel_buffer_cm),sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1023  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_b_recv_accel_buffer_cm),sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1024  }
1025  }
1026 #endif
1027  }
1028  }
1029 
1030  // inner core mesh
1031  mp->num_interfaces_inner_core = *num_interfaces_inner_core;
1032  mp->max_nibool_interfaces_ic = *max_nibool_interfaces_ic;
1033  if (mp->num_interfaces_inner_core > 0) {
1034  // number of ibool entries array
1035  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nibool_interfaces_inner_core, nibool_interfaces_inner_core,
1036  mp->num_interfaces_inner_core);
1037 
1038  // ibool entries (iglob indices) values on interface
1039  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibool_interfaces_inner_core, ibool_interfaces_inner_core,
1040  mp->num_interfaces_inner_core * mp->max_nibool_interfaces_ic);
1041 
1042  size_mpi_buffer = NDIM * (mp->max_nibool_interfaces_ic) * (mp->num_interfaces_inner_core);
1043 
1044  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_send_accel_buffer_inner_core, size_mpi_buffer);
1045  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1046  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_send_accel_buffer_inner_core, size_mpi_buffer);
1047  }
1048 
1049  // asynchronous MPI buffer
1050  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) {
1051 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1052  if (run_opencl) {
1053  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(send_accel_buffer_ic, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1054  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(recv_accel_buffer_ic, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1055 
1056  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1057  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(b_send_accel_buffer_ic, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1058  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(b_recv_accel_buffer_ic, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1059  }
1060  }
1061 #endif
1062 #ifdef USE_CUDA
1063  if (run_cuda) {
1064  // note: Allocate pinned MPI buffers.
1065  // MPI buffers use pinned memory allocated by cudaMallocHost, which
1066  // enables the use of asynchronous memory copies from host <-> device
1067  // send buffer
1068  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_send_accel_buffer_ic),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1069  // receive buffer
1070  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_recv_accel_buffer_ic),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1071  // adjoint
1072  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1073  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_b_send_accel_buffer_ic),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1074  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_b_recv_accel_buffer_ic),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1075  }
1076  }
1077 #endif
1078  }
1079  }
1080  // outer core mesh
1081  // note: uses only scalar wavefield arrays
1082  mp->num_interfaces_outer_core = *num_interfaces_outer_core;
1083  mp->max_nibool_interfaces_oc = *max_nibool_interfaces_oc;
1084  if (mp->num_interfaces_outer_core > 0) {
1085  // number of ibool entries array
1086  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_nibool_interfaces_outer_core, nibool_interfaces_outer_core,
1087  mp->num_interfaces_outer_core);
1088 
1089  // ibool entries (iglob indices) values on interface
1090  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibool_interfaces_outer_core, ibool_interfaces_outer_core,
1091  (mp->num_interfaces_outer_core) * (mp->max_nibool_interfaces_oc));
1092 
1093  size_mpi_buffer = (mp->max_nibool_interfaces_oc)*(mp->num_interfaces_outer_core);
1094 
1095  // allocates MPI buffer for exchange with CPU
1096  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_send_accel_buffer_outer_core, size_mpi_buffer);
1097  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1098  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_send_accel_buffer_outer_core, size_mpi_buffer);
1099  }
1100 
1101  // asynchronous MPI buffer
1102  if (GPU_ASYNC_COPY) {
1103 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1104  if (run_opencl) {
1105  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(send_accel_buffer_oc, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1106  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(recv_accel_buffer_oc, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1107 
1108  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1109  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(b_send_accel_buffer_oc, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1110  ALLOC_PINNED_BUFFER_OCL(b_recv_accel_buffer_oc, sizeof(realw)* size_mpi_buffer);
1111  }
1112  }
1113 #endif
1114 #ifdef USE_CUDA
1115  if (run_cuda) {
1116  // note: Allocate pinned MPI buffers.
1117  // MPI buffers use pinned memory allocated by cudaMallocHost, which
1118  // enables the use of asynchronous memory copies from host <-> device
1119  // send buffer
1120  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_send_accel_buffer_oc),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1121  // receive buffer
1122  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_recv_accel_buffer_oc),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1123  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1124  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_b_send_accel_buffer_oc),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1125  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMallocHost((void**)&(mp->h_b_recv_accel_buffer_oc),sizeof(realw)*size_mpi_buffer ),8004);
1126  }
1127  }
1128 #endif
1129  }
1130  }
1131 
1132  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_mpi_buffers_device");
1133 }

1136 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

1138 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1139 
1140 extern EXTERN_LANG
1141 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_fields_noise_device,
1142  PREPARE_FIELDS_NOISE_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
1143  int *NSPEC_TOP,
1144  int *NSTEP,
1145  int *h_ibelm_top_crust_mantle,
1146  realw *noise_sourcearray,
1147  realw *normal_x_noise,
1148  realw *normal_y_noise,
1149  realw *normal_z_noise,
1150  realw *mask_noise,
1151  realw *jacobian2D_top_crust_mantle) {
1152 
1153  TRACE ("prepare_fields_noise_device");
1154 
1155  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
1156 
1157  // free surface
1158  mp->nspec2D_top_crust_mantle = *NSPEC_TOP;
1159  if (mp->nspec2D_top_crust_mantle > 0) {
1160  // note: d_ibelm_top_crust_mantle will only be needed for noise computations
1161  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_top_crust_mantle, h_ibelm_top_crust_mantle, mp->nspec2D_top_crust_mantle);
1162 
1163  // alloc storage for the surface buffer to be copied
1164  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_noise_surface_movie, NDIM * NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_top_crust_mantle);
1165 
1166  } else {
1167  // for global mesh: each crust/mantle slice should have at top a free surface
1168  exit_on_error ("prepare_fields_noise_device NSPEC_TOP not properly initialized");
1169  }
1170 
1171  // prepares noise source array
1172  if (mp->noise_tomography == 1) {
1173  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_noise_sourcearray, noise_sourcearray, NDIM*NGLL3 * (*NSTEP));
1174  }
1175 
1176  // prepares noise directions
1177  if (mp->noise_tomography > 1) {
1178  size_t nface_size = NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_top_crust_mantle;
1179 
1180  // allocates memory on GPU
1181  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_x_noise, normal_x_noise, nface_size);
1182  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_y_noise, normal_y_noise, nface_size);
1183  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_z_noise, normal_z_noise, nface_size);
1184 
1185  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_mask_noise, mask_noise, nface_size);
1186  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_top_crust_mantle, jacobian2D_top_crust_mantle, nface_size);
1187  }
1188 
1189  // prepares noise strength kernel
1190  if (mp->noise_tomography == 3) {
1191  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_Sigma_kl, NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE);
1192  // initializes kernel values to zero
1193  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_Sigma_kl, NGLL3 * mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE, 0);
1194  }
1195 
1196  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_fields_noise_device");
1197 }

1204 extern EXTERN_LANG
1205 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_oceans_device,
1206  PREPARE_OCEANS_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
1207  int *npoin_oceans,
1208  int *h_iglob_ocean_load,
1209  realw *h_rmass_ocean_load_selected,
1210  realw *h_normal_ocean_load) {
1211 
1212  TRACE ("prepare_oceans_device");
1213  Mesh *mp = (Mesh *) *Mesh_pointer_f;
1214 
1215  // arrays with global points on ocean surface
1216  mp->npoin_oceans = *npoin_oceans;
1217 
1218  // checks for global partitions, each slice must have a top surface with points on i
1219 
1220  if (mp->npoin_oceans == 0) {
1221  exit_on_error ("prepare_oceans_device has zero npoin_oceans");
1222  }
1223 
1224  // global point indices
1225  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibool_ocean_load, h_iglob_ocean_load, mp->npoin_oceans);
1226 
1227  // mass matrix
1228  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rmass_ocean_load, h_rmass_ocean_load_selected, mp->npoin_oceans);
1229 
1230  // normals
1231  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_ocean_load, h_normal_ocean_load, NDIM * mp->npoin_oceans);
1232 
1233  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_oceans_device");
1234 }

1300  /*Assuming NGLLX=5. Padded is then 128 (5^3+3) */

1310  printf("Error: crust/mantle array size exceeds integer 4-byte limit: %lu > 2147483647 \n",(long int)mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE*NGLL3_PADDED);

1585  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c34store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c34store,
1586  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1587  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c35store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c35store,
1588  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1589  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c36store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c36store,
1590  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1591  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c44store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c44store,
1592  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1593  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c45store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c45store,
1594  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1595  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c46store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c46store,
1596  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1597  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c55store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c55store,
1598  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1599  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c56store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c56store,
1600  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1601  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_c66store_crust_mantle.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), c66store,
1602  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),4800);
1603  }
1604 #endif
1605  }
1606 
1607  // needed for boundary kernel calculations
1608  if (mp->simulation_type == 3 && mp->save_boundary_mesh) {
1609  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_rhostore_crust_mantle, size_padded);
1610 
1611  int i;
1612  for (i = 0; i < mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE; i++) {
1613 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1614  if (run_opencl) {
1615  int offset = i * NGLL3_PADDED * sizeof(realw);
1616  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_rhostore_crust_mantle.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1617  NGLL3 * sizeof (realw), &h_rho[i * NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1618  }
1619 #endif
1620 #ifdef USE_CUDA
1621  if (run_cuda) {
1622  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy(mp->d_rhostore_crust_mantle.cuda+i*NGLL3_PADDED, &h_rho[i*NGLL3],
1623  NGLL3*sizeof(realw),cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),2106);
1624  }
1625 #endif
1626  }
1627  }
1628 
1629  // mesh locations
1630  TRACE ("prepare_crust_mantle mesh locations");
1631 
1632  // rstore
1633  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rstore_crust_mantle, h_rstore, NDIM*size_glob);
1634 
1635  // inner/outer elements
1636  mp->num_phase_ispec_crust_mantle = *num_phase_ispec;
1637  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_phase_ispec_inner_crust_mantle, phase_ispec_inner, mp->num_phase_ispec_crust_mantle*2);
1638 
1639  mp->nspec_outer_crust_mantle = *nspec_outer;
1640  mp->nspec_inner_crust_mantle = *nspec_inner;
1641 
1642  // CMB/fluid outer core coupling
1643  mp->nspec2D_bottom_crust_mantle = *NSPEC2D_BOTTOM_CM;
1644  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_bottom_crust_mantle, h_ibelm_bottom_crust_mantle, mp->nspec2D_bottom_crust_mantle);
1645 
1646  // wavefield
1647  TRACE ("prepare_crust_mantle wavefields");
1648  size_t size = NDIM * mp->NGLOB_CRUST_MANTLE;
1649 
1650  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_displ_crust_mantle, size);
1651  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_veloc_crust_mantle, size);
1652  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_accel_crust_mantle, size);
1653  // backward/reconstructed wavefield
1654  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1655  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_displ_crust_mantle, size);
1656  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_veloc_crust_mantle, size);
1657  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_accel_crust_mantle, size);
1658 
1659  //debugging with empty arrays
1660  if (DEBUG_BACKWARD_SIMULATIONS == 1) {
1661  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_b_displ_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1662  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_b_veloc_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1663  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_b_accel_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1664  }
1665  }
1666 
1667 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1668  if (run_opencl) {
1669 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_FIELDS
1670  cl_int errcode;
1671  cl_image_format format = {CL_R, CL_UNSIGNED_INT32};
1672 
1673  mp->d_displ_cm_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size, 1, 0, mp->d_displ_crust_mantle.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
1674  mp->d_accel_cm_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size, 1, 0, mp->d_accel_crust_mantle.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
1675  // backward/reconstructed fields
1676  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1677  mp->d_b_displ_cm_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size, 1, 0, mp->d_b_displ_crust_mantle.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
1678  mp->d_b_accel_cm_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size, 1, 0, mp->d_b_accel_crust_mantle.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
1679  } else {
1680  mp->d_b_displ_cm_tex = moclGetDummyImage2D(mp);
1681  mp->d_b_accel_cm_tex = moclGetDummyImage2D(mp);
1682  }
1683 #endif
1684  }
1685 #endif
1686 #ifdef USE_CUDA
1687  if (run_cuda) {
1688 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_FIELDS
1689  {
1690  // checks single precision
1691  if (sizeof(realw) != sizeof(float)) exit_on_error("TEXTURES only work with realw selected as float");
1692  // binds textures
1693 #ifdef USE_OLDER_CUDA4_GPU
1694  cudaChannelFormatDesc channelDesc = cudaCreateChannelDesc<realw>();
1695  const textureReference* d_displ_cm_tex_ref_ptr;
1696  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_displ_cm_tex_ref_ptr, "d_displ_cm_tex"), 4021);
1697  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_displ_cm_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_displ_crust_mantle.cuda,
1698  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4021);
1699 
1700  const textureReference* d_accel_cm_tex_ref_ptr;
1701  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_accel_cm_tex_ref_ptr, "d_accel_cm_tex"), 4023);
1702  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_accel_cm_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_accel_crust_mantle.cuda,
1703  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4023);
1704 
1705  // backward/reconstructed wavefields
1706  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1707  const textureReference* d_b_displ_cm_tex_ref_ptr;
1708  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_b_displ_cm_tex_ref_ptr, "d_b_displ_cm_tex"), 4021);
1709  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_b_displ_cm_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_b_displ_crust_mantle.cuda,
1710  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4021);
1711 
1712  const textureReference* d_b_accel_cm_tex_ref_ptr;
1713  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_b_accel_cm_tex_ref_ptr, "d_b_accel_cm_tex"), 4023);

1716  }
1717 #else
1718  cudaChannelFormatDesc channelDesc = cudaCreateChannelDesc<realw>();
1719  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_displ_cm_tex, mp->d_displ_crust_mantle.cuda,
1720  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4021);
1721  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_accel_cm_tex, mp->d_accel_crust_mantle.cuda,
1722  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4023);
1723  // backward/reconstructed wavefields
1724  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1725  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_b_displ_cm_tex, mp->d_b_displ_crust_mantle.cuda,
1726  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4021);
1727  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_b_accel_cm_tex, mp->d_b_accel_crust_mantle.cuda,
1728  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size), 4023);
1729  }
1730 #endif
1731  }
1732 #endif
1733  }
1734 #endif
1735 
1736  // mass matrices
1737  TRACE ("prepare_crust_mantle mass matrices");
1738  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rmassz_crust_mantle, h_rmassz, size_glob);
1739  if ((*NCHUNKS_VAL != 6 && mp->absorbing_conditions) || (mp->rotation && mp->exact_mass_matrix_for_rotation)) {
1740  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rmassx_crust_mantle, h_rmassx, size_glob);
1741  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rmassy_crust_mantle, h_rmassy, size_glob);
1742  } else {
1743  mp->d_rmassx_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmassz_crust_mantle);
1744  mp->d_rmassy_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmassz_crust_mantle);
1745  }
1746 
1747  // kernel simulations
1748  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1749  mp->d_b_rmassz_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmassz_crust_mantle);
1750  if (mp->rotation && mp->exact_mass_matrix_for_rotation) {
1751  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_rmassx_crust_mantle, h_b_rmassx, size_glob);
1752  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_b_rmassy_crust_mantle, h_b_rmassy, size_glob);
1753  } else {
1754  mp->d_b_rmassx_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmassx_crust_mantle);
1755  mp->d_b_rmassy_crust_mantle = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmassy_crust_mantle);
1756  }
1757 
1758  // kernels
1759  size = NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_CRUST_MANTLE);
1760 
1761  // density kernel
1762  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_rho_kl_crust_mantle, size);
1763  // initializes kernel values to zero
1764  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_rho_kl_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1765 
1766  // wavespeed kernels
1767  if (! mp->anisotropic_kl) {
1768  // isotropic kernels
1769  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_alpha_kl_crust_mantle, size);
1770  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_beta_kl_crust_mantle, size);
1771  // sets array values to zero
1772  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_alpha_kl_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1773  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_beta_kl_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1774 
1775  } else {
1776  // anisotropic kernels
1777  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_cijkl_kl_crust_mantle, 21 * size);
1778  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_cijkl_kl_crust_mantle, 21 * size, 0);
1779  }
1780 
1781  // preconditioner
1782  if (mp->approximate_hess_kl) {
1783  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_hess_kl_crust_mantle, size);
1784  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_hess_kl_crust_mantle, size, 0);
1785  }
1786  }
1787 
1788  // mesh coloring
1789  mp->num_colors_outer_crust_mantle = *num_colors_outer;
1790  mp->num_colors_inner_crust_mantle = *num_colors_inner;
1791  mp->h_num_elem_colors_crust_mantle = (int *) num_elem_colors;
1792 
1793  // executes gpu calls
1794  // (especially needed for OpenCL kernels to finish executing)
1795  gpuSynchronize();
1796 
1797  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_crust_mantle_device");
1798  // debug
1799  //printf("%d rank - prepare_crust_mantle done",mp->myrank);
1800 }

1807 extern EXTERN_LANG
1808 void FC_FUNC_ (prepare_outer_core_device,
1809  PREPARE_OUTER_CORE_DEVICE) (long *Mesh_pointer_f,
1810  realw *h_xix, realw *h_xiy, realw *h_xiz,

1812  realw *h_gammax, realw *h_gammay, realw *h_gammaz,
1813  realw *h_rho, realw *h_kappav,
1814  realw *h_rmass,

1816  realw *h_rstore,
1817  int *num_phase_ispec,
1818  int *phase_ispec_inner,
1819  int *nspec_outer,
1820  int *nspec_inner,

1822  int *NSPEC2D_BOTTOM_OC,

1828  int *h_ibelm_bottom_outer_core,
1829  int *num_colors_outer,
1830  int *num_colors_inner,
1831  int *num_elem_colors) {
1832 
1833  TRACE ("prepare_outer_core_device");
1834

1836 
1837  /*Assuming NGLLX=5. Padded is then 128 (5^3+3) */
1838

1840  size_t size_glob = mp->NGLOB_OUTER_CORE;
1841 
1842  // mesh
1843  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_xix_outer_core, size_padded);
1844  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_xiy_outer_core, size_padded);
1845  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_xiz_outer_core, size_padded);
1846  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_etax_outer_core, size_padded);
1847  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_etay_outer_core, size_padded);
1848  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_etaz_outer_core, size_padded);
1849  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_gammax_outer_core, size_padded);
1850  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_gammay_outer_core, size_padded);
1851  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_gammaz_outer_core, size_padded);
1852 
1853  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_kappavstore_outer_core, size_padded);
1854 
1855  // transfer constant element data with padding
1856 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1857  if (run_opencl) {
1858  int i;
1859  for (i = 0; i < mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE; i++) {
1860  int offset = i * NGLL3_PADDED * sizeof (realw);
1861  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_xix_outer_core.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1862  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_xix[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1863

1865  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_xiy[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1866 
1867  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_xiz_outer_core.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1868  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_xiz[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1869 
1870  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_etax_outer_core.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1871  NGLL3 * sizeof (realw), &h_etax[i * NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1872 
1873  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_etay_outer_core.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1874  NGLL3 * sizeof (realw), &h_etay[i * NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1875 
1876  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_etaz_outer_core.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1877  NGLL3 * sizeof (realw), &h_etaz[i * NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1878

1880  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_gammax[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1881

1883  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_gammay[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1884 
1885  clCheck (clEnqueueWriteBuffer (mocl.command_queue, mp->d_gammaz_outer_core.ocl, CL_FALSE, offset,
1886  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_gammaz[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1887

1889  NGLL3*sizeof (realw), &h_kappav[i*NGLL3], 0, NULL, NULL));
1890  }
1891  }
1892 #endif

1897  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),1501);

1908  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),1502);
1909 
1910  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_gammax_outer_core.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), h_gammax,
1911  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),1503);

1937  if (run_cuda) {
1938  // faster (small memcpy have low bandwidth...)
1939  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaMemcpy2D(mp->d_rhostore_outer_core.cuda, NGLL3_PADDED*sizeof(realw), h_rho,
1940  NGLL3*sizeof(realw), NGLL3*sizeof(realw),mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE,cudaMemcpyHostToDevice),2106);
1941  }
1942 #endif
1943  }
1944 
1945  // global indexing
1946  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibool_outer_core, h_ibool, NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE));
1947 
1948  // mesh locations
1949 
1950  // always needed
1951  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rstore_outer_core, h_rstore, NDIM * size_glob);
1952 
1953  // inner/outer elements
1954 
1955  mp->num_phase_ispec_outer_core = *num_phase_ispec;
1956  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_phase_ispec_inner_outer_core, phase_ispec_inner, mp->num_phase_ispec_outer_core*2);
1957 
1958  mp->nspec_outer_outer_core = *nspec_outer;
1959  mp->nspec_inner_outer_core = *nspec_inner;
1960 
1961  // CMB/ICB coupling
1962 
1963  mp->nspec2D_top_outer_core = *NSPEC2D_TOP_OC;
1964  mp->nspec2D_bottom_outer_core = *NSPEC2D_BOTTOM_OC;
1965 
1966  size_t size_toc = NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_top_outer_core;
1967  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_top_outer_core, h_ibelm_top_outer_core, mp->nspec2D_top_outer_core);
1968  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_top_outer_core, h_jacobian2D_top_outer_core, size_toc);
1969  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_top_outer_core, h_normal_top_outer_core, NDIM*size_toc);
1970 
1971  size_t size_boc = NGLL2 * mp->nspec2D_bottom_outer_core;
1972  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_bottom_outer_core, h_ibelm_bottom_outer_core, mp->nspec2D_bottom_outer_core);
1973  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_jacobian2D_bottom_outer_core, h_jacobian2D_bottom_outer_core, size_boc);
1974  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_normal_bottom_outer_core, h_normal_bottom_outer_core, NDIM*size_boc);
1975 
1976  // wavefield
1977  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_displ_outer_core, size_glob);
1978  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_veloc_outer_core, size_glob);
1979  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_accel_outer_core, size_glob);
1980  // backward/reconstructed wavefield
1981  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
1982  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_displ_outer_core, size_glob);
1983  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_veloc_outer_core, size_glob);
1984  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_accel_outer_core, size_glob);
1985 
1986  //debugging with empty arrays
1987  if (DEBUG_BACKWARD_SIMULATIONS == 1) {
1988  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_b_displ_outer_core, size_glob, 0);
1989  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_b_veloc_outer_core, size_glob, 0);
1990  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_b_accel_outer_core, size_glob, 0);
1991  }
1992  }
1993 
1994 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
1995  if (run_opencl) {
1996 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_FIELDS
1997  cl_int errcode;
1998  cl_image_format format = {CL_R, CL_UNSIGNED_INT32};
1999 
2000  mp->d_displ_oc_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size_glob, 1, 0, mp->d_displ_outer_core.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
2001  mp->d_accel_oc_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size_glob, 1, 0, mp->d_accel_outer_core.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
2002  // backward/reconstructed fields
2003  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
2004  mp->d_b_displ_oc_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size_glob, 1, 0, mp->d_b_displ_outer_core.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
2005  mp->d_b_accel_oc_tex = clCreateImage2D (mocl.context, CL_MEM_READ_ONLY, &format, size_glob, 1, 0, mp->d_b_accel_outer_core.ocl, clck_(&errcode));
2006  } else {
2007  mp->d_b_displ_oc_tex = moclGetDummyImage2D(mp);
2008  mp->d_b_accel_oc_tex = moclGetDummyImage2D(mp);
2009  }
2010 #endif
2011  }
2012 #endif
2013 #ifdef USE_CUDA
2014  if (run_cuda) {
2015 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_FIELDS
2016 #ifdef USE_OLDER_CUDA4_GPU
2017  cudaChannelFormatDesc channelDesc = cudaCreateChannelDesc<realw>();
2018  const textureReference* d_displ_oc_tex_ref_ptr;
2019  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_displ_oc_tex_ref_ptr, "d_displ_oc_tex"), 5021);
2020  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_displ_oc_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_displ_outer_core.cuda,
2021  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5021);
2022 
2023  const textureReference* d_accel_oc_tex_ref_ptr;
2024  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_accel_oc_tex_ref_ptr, "d_accel_oc_tex"), 5023);
2025  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_accel_oc_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_accel_outer_core.cuda,
2026  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5023);
2027  // backward/reconstructed wavefields
2028  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
2029  const textureReference* d_b_displ_oc_tex_ref_ptr;
2030  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_b_displ_oc_tex_ref_ptr, "d_b_displ_oc_tex"), 5021);
2031  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_b_displ_oc_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_b_displ_outer_core.cuda,
2032  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5021);
2033 
2034  const textureReference* d_b_accel_oc_tex_ref_ptr;
2035  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaGetTextureReference(&d_b_accel_oc_tex_ref_ptr, "d_b_accel_oc_tex"), 5023);
2036  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, d_b_accel_oc_tex_ref_ptr, mp->d_b_accel_outer_core.cuda,
2037  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5023);
2038  }
2039 #else
2040  cudaChannelFormatDesc channelDesc = cudaCreateChannelDesc<realw>();
2041  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_displ_oc_tex, mp->d_displ_outer_core.cuda,
2042  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5021);
2043  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_accel_oc_tex, mp->d_accel_outer_core.cuda,
2044  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5023);
2045  // backward/reconstructed wavefields
2046  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
2047  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_b_displ_oc_tex, mp->d_b_displ_outer_core.cuda,
2048  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5021);
2049  print_CUDA_error_if_any(cudaBindTexture(0, &d_b_accel_oc_tex, mp->d_b_accel_outer_core.cuda,
2050  &channelDesc, sizeof(realw)*size_glob), 5023);
2051  }
2052 #endif
2053 #endif
2054  }
2055 #endif
2056 
2057  // mass matrix
2058  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_realw (&mp->d_rmass_outer_core, h_rmass, size_glob);
2059 
2060  // kernel simulations
2061  if (mp->simulation_type == 3) {
2062  // mass matrix
2063  mp->d_b_rmass_outer_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmass_outer_core);
2064 
2065  //kernels
2066  size_t size = NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_OUTER_CORE);
2067 
2068  // density kernel
2069  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_rho_kl_outer_core, size);
2070  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_rho_kl_outer_core, size, 0);
2071 
2072  // isotropic kernel
2073  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_alpha_kl_outer_core, size);
2074  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_alpha_kl_outer_core, size, 0);
2075  }
2076 
2077  // mesh coloring
2078  mp->num_colors_outer_outer_core = *num_colors_outer;
2079  mp->num_colors_inner_outer_core = *num_colors_inner;
2080  mp->h_num_elem_colors_outer_core = (int *) num_elem_colors;
2081 
2082  // executes gpu calls
2083  // (especially needed for OpenCL kernels to finish executing)
2084  gpuSynchronize();
2085 
2086  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_outer_core_device");
2087 }

2307  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_idoubling_inner_core, h_idoubling_inner_core, mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE);
2308

2310

2315  }
2316 
2317  // inner/outer elements
2318  mp->num_phase_ispec_inner_core = *num_phase_ispec;
2319  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_phase_ispec_inner_inner_core, phase_ispec_inner, mp->num_phase_ispec_inner_core*2);
2320 
2321  mp->nspec_outer_inner_core = *nspec_outer;
2322  mp->nspec_inner_inner_core = *nspec_inner;
2323 
2324  // boundary elements on top
2325 
2326  mp->nspec2D_top_inner_core = *NSPEC2D_TOP_IC;
2327  gpuCreateCopy_todevice_int (&mp->d_ibelm_top_inner_core, h_ibelm_top_inner_core, mp->nspec2D_top_inner_core);
2328 
2329  // wavefield
2330  size_t size = NDIM * mp->NGLOB_INNER_CORE;
2331 
2332  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_displ_inner_core, size);
2333  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_veloc_inner_core, size);
2334  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_accel_inner_core, size);

2337  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_displ_inner_core, size);
2338  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_veloc_inner_core, size);
2339  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_b_accel_inner_core, size);
2340

2343  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_displ_inner_core, size, 0);
2344  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_veloc_inner_core, size, 0);
2345  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_accel_inner_core, size, 0);
2346  }
2347  }
2348 
2349 #ifdef USE_OPENCL
2350  if (run_opencl) {
2351 #ifdef USE_TEXTURES_FIELDS

2422 
2423  // kernel simulations

2432  mp->d_b_rmassy_inner_core = gpuTakeRef(mp->d_rmassy_inner_core);
2433  }

2436  // kernels
2437  size = NGLL3 * (mp->NSPEC_INNER_CORE);
2438

2441  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_rho_kl_inner_core, size, 0);

2445  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_alpha_kl_inner_core, size, 0);
2446 
2447  gpuMalloc_realw (&mp->d_beta_kl_inner_core, size);
2448  gpuMemset_realw (&mp->d_beta_kl_inner_core, size, 0);
2449  }
2450 
2451  // mesh coloring

2453  mp->num_colors_inner_inner_core = *num_colors_inner;
2454  mp->h_num_elem_colors_inner_core = (int *) num_elem_colors;
2455 
2456  // executes gpu calls
2457  // (especially needed for OpenCL kernels to finish executing)
2458  gpuSynchronize();
2459 
2460  GPU_ERROR_CHECKING ("prepare_inner_core_device");
2461 }
